roleset.name: not sink in water
roleset.note: FLOAT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'float' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3 roll-51.3.1 run-51.3.2-2 slide-11.2-1; other framed members include: shake; charge, leap, roll, sneak, walk, wind; halt, roll. Comparison to 'roll' and 'wind'. (from float.01-v)

example.name: float-v: ergative, with LOC
example.text: [The second part, consisting of $100 million of senior subordinated floating-rate notes,]-1 was priced *trace*-1 at 99 3/4 *trace*-1 to float 4.25% above the three-month London interbank offered rate.
example.arg: 4.25% above the three-month London interbank offered rate

example.name: float-v: float as introduce
example.text: One trial balloon *trace-1* [Mr. Spiegel]-2 is said *trace-2* to have floated *trace-3* to investors: Columbia might be broken up, as Mellon Bank was split into a good bank and a bad bank.

roleset.name: give, usually money, sometimes as a loan
roleset.note: FLOAT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from float.02-v)

role.descr: in exchange for/ purpose of loan

example.name: float-v: all args
example.text: it would be next month or may . and , i-1 may be able *PRO*-1 to float you a few bucks for your time ...
